Error.FailedUnpackLinkType: Failed to get interface's link-type. Check server's interface.

Response.SetCompression.Success.On: Compression is enabled! Changes will take effect after saving config and reboot.
Response.SetCompression.Success.Off: Compression is disabled! Changes will take effect after saving config and reboot.

Response.Error.InterfacesGet: Failed to get server network interfaces list.
Response.Error.MutexPoisoned: Unexpected error appeared while blocking some memory.
Tab.About.Description: Client-server analyser of network traffic on a home network
Tab.About.CheckGithub: Check out the code on GitHub!
Tab.SettingsClient.Hover.FieldNotApplied: This field is differ from set up. Also, donâ€™t forget to save the config file if needed.
Tab.SettingsClient.Hover.SettingSavesCon: Setting just saves the config file.
Tab.SettingsClient.Label.UnparsedFramesD: If this option is enabled, the client will discard all raw frames. This reduces the load on the client. However, it's best to also disable the corresponding option ("Sending Raw Frames") in the server settings.
Tab.SettingsClient.Label.UnparsedFramesT: If this option is enabled, only the last N frames (set here) will be held in runtime. It works if the "Unparsed Frames Drop" option is disabled.
Tab.SettingsClient.Note.FieldAppliedImme: The field takes effect after applying.
Tab.SettingsClient.Note.FieldAppliedAfte: The field takes effect after logout.
The field takes effect after config save & app restart.
Tab.SettingsServer.Hover.FieldDifferFrom: Server config has another value. To take effects - save config & restart the server.
Tab.SettingsServer.Note.RestartServer:
After confirmation, you may not receive a message about the reboot.
Monitor the server status.
